Export.Routine:
INIssueLocPick ; Copied from INDispenseToPatientPick #include INConst #include COMSYS #include %occInclude #def1arg TempStore(%1) ^CacheTemp(YUCI,YUSER,%1) ;++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; Called By : [P] Button on Form INIssueLoc ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------+ List ; Dispense To Patient Picklist | Title (2A) ; Issued By Location LOCN_ID (LOCATION_NAME) | ;-----------------------+------------------------+--------------------------+ ; For: TO_LOCATION | | | Title (2B) ; Reference: CUST_ID | Status: ENUM_STATUS | Issue Number: ISSUE_NO | ;--------+---------+----+-+-------------+--------+-+------+--------+--------+ ; Number | Sending | Item | Item | Quantity | Unit | Use By | Lot | Header ; | Storage | | Description | | | Date | Number | ;--------+---------+------+-------------+----------+------+--------+--------+ ; | | | | | | | | ANZ ; | | | | | | | | ; | | | | | | | | ;--------+---------+------+-------------+----------+------+--------+--------+ ; (text after Pick List) | ZUSATZTEXT ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------+ ; May be multiple pages each with Title through to ANZ ;++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ CanPrintPick(pidIssue) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; Called By: ; PrintPick^INIssueLocPick ; Form INIssueLoc : Button 5 - Execute To Check For Disabled ; ; Params: ; pidIssue - Key of header record ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: strStatus, error message if unable to print ; ; History: ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objIssue,strStatus set strStatus = $$$OK if '$$$NoKey(pidIssue) { if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { if '$data(^INIssueLine(YM,pidIssue)) { set strStatus = $$$MakeStatus("IN00427") ;No stock has been selected to be transferred. } set objIssue = $get(^INIssue(YM,pidIssue,1)) if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { if $$IsLockedSiteLocation^INLocking($$$INIssueFromLocn(objIssue)) { set strStatus = $$ReasonLocked^INLocking($$$INIssueFromLocn(objIssue)) } } } } else { set strStatus = $$$MakeStatus(32072) ; "Please select a data record first." } $$$YQHandler(strStatus) quit strStatus PrintPick(pidIssue) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Print the Pick List for the Transfer ; ; Called By: ; PrintPick^INIssueLocPick ; ; Params: pidIssue ; ; Returns: Status ; ; ; History: ; 14-May-2009 PPP SR16199: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ANZM,strStatus,YDDSATZ kill ^WWWSOR(YUSER) set strStatus=$$$OK set YBACK = "" set ANZM=0 set YNOFOOT=1 do List(pidIssue) if ANZM=0 do ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(46),1,,1) ; "No Data Available" kill ^WWWSOR(YUSER) quit strStatus List(pidIssue) ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Print the Pick List for the Transfer ; ; Params: pidIssue ; ; Returns: None ; ; ; History: ; 20-Feb-2009 GRF SR16303: Move Title & from Header to match ;
; pass parameters to Header and ANZ ; 03-Feb-2009 DavidR SR16303: copied and modified from INTRNPickList ; 15-Dec-2008 DavidR SR16302: Added two more columns for lot number and expiry ; date. Also modified the naming of the columns to be ; reliant on the form, to allow for any customisation. ; 12-Dec-2007 PPP SR15597: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ANZSEIT,idForm,intLn,LFN,objVORGLANG,TEXT,UES,VORG1,YFELD set YNOFOOT=1 do ^WWWBACK set VORG1 = $get(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)) set objVORGLANG = $get(^INVORGLANG(YM,YM,SPRACHE,1)) set TEXT = $$$INVORGLANGTextAfterPickList(objVORGLANG) set ANZSEIT=$PIECE(VORG1,Y,82) ; Number within side if ANZSEIT="" SET ANZSEIT=30 set idForm = "INIssueLine" set UES=$$^WWWTEXT(207) ; "Number" set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINIssueLineFromStorage) ; 2 "Sending Storage" set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINIssueLineItem) ; 1 "Item" set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(32026) ; "Item Description" set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINIssueLineQtyIssued) ; 3 "Quantity" set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINIssueLineUnit) ; 4 "Unit" set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWTEXT("AL00016")_"/"_$$^WWWTEXT("AL00017") ; "Lot Number / Use By Date" set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINIssueLineToStorage) ; 3 "To Storage" set ANZM=0 do Title(pidIssue) do START100^WWWTAB ;STARTEN DER ÜBERSCHRIFT ;launching the superscription do Header(UES) set YDDSATZ=0 set intLn = 0 for { set intLn = $order(^INIssueLine(YM,pidIssue,intLn)) quit:intLn="" set LFN="" set YFELD=$get(^INIssueLine(YM,pidIssue,intLn,1)) if (ANZM'=0) && (ANZM#ANZSEIT=0) { write "" write "",YCR do FF^WWWW() ; FORMFEED do Title(pidIssue) do START100^WWWTAB ;STARTEN DER ÜBERSCHRIFT ;launching the superscription do Header(UES) } do ANZ(pidIssue,intLn) } do LEER^WWWTAB(15,8) ;SR16302 added columns from 6 to 8 write "",YCR do ZUSATZTEXT(TEXT) quit ANZ(pidIssue,pintLn) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Print the Pick List for the Transfer ; ; Params: pintLn - line number ; ; Returns: None ; ; ; History: ; 06-Apr-2011 shobby SR17714.6: Formatting for 'To Storage' ; 04-Apr-2011 shobby SR17714.4: Redirected previous change to INLP. ; 28-Apr-2011 shobby SR17714.2: Use CodeWithTSU formatting. ; 07-Mar-2011 PPP SR17677: Removed the 15 character limit for Desc ; 14-May-2009 PPP SR16199:Updated the fields displayed ; 03-Feb-2009 DavidR SR16303: copied and modified from INTRNPick ; 15-Dec-2007 DavidR SR16302: Modified to poulate extra fields added (7 and 8) ; also modified call to use macro to make it readable. ; 12-Dec-2007 PPP SR15597: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idItem,idUnit,objItem,strBundleValues,strItemDescription set idItem = $$$INIssueLineItem(YFELD) set ANZM = ANZM+1 write YCR do NL^WWWTAB ; 1. Line Number ;--------------------------------------- do NF^WWWTAB write YCR,pintLn," " ; 2. Storage ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB ;SR17714.2 write $$$INIssueLineFromStorage(YFELD)," " write $$CodeWithTSU2^INLP($$$INIssueFromLocn($get(^INIssue(0,pidIssue,1))),$$$INIssueLineFromStorage(YFELD)) ;SR17714.4 ; 3. Item ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB write idItem," " ; 4. Item Description ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB set objItem = $get(^INART(YM,idItem,1)) set strItemDescription = $$$INARTSearchName(objItem) //SR17677 //if $length(strItemDescription) > 15 { // set strItemDescription = $extract(strItemDescription,1,15)_"..." //} write strItemDescription," " ; 5. Quantity ;--------------------------------------- do ZWR^WWWTAB write $$$INIssueLineQtyIssued(YFELD)," " ; 6. Unit ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB set idUnit = $$$INIssueLineUnit(YFELD) write idUnit_" ("_$$$AppEnum("EINHEIT",idUnit)_")"," " ; 7. Bundle Values ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB set strBundleValues=$$GetBundleDesc^INIssueLocLine(pidIssue, pintLn) write strBundleValues," " ; 8. To Storage ;--------------------------------------- ; Added do ZWL^WWWTAB ;17714.6 write $$$INIssueLineToStorage(YFELD)," " write $$CodeWithTSU2^INLP($$$INIssueToLocn($get(^INIssue(0,pidIssue,1))),$$$INIssueLineToStorage(YFELD)) ;SR17714.6 write YCR do EL^WWWTAB quit ZUSATZTEXT(TEXT) ;ZUSATZTEXT new YI IF ANZM'=0 IF TEXT'="" DO . WRITE "
" . IF '$FIND(TEXT,"<") DO QUIT . . FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(TEXT,"|",YI,9999)="" WRITE $PIECE(TEXT,"|",YI),"
",YCR ;NUR TEXT ;only Text . ; . FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(TEXT,"|",YI,9999)="" WRITE $PIECE(TEXT,"|",YI),YCR ;HTML WRITE YCR DO FF^WWWW() WRITE YCR QUIT Title(pidIssue) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 14-May-2009 PPP SR16199:Updated the fields displayed ; 03-Feb-2009 DavidR SR16303: copied and modified from INTRNPick ; 12-Dec-2007 PPP SR15597: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new dtePosted,dteTransfer,idFromLocn,idRef,idToLocn,intStatus new objIssue,objRecord,strDescription set objIssue = $get(^INIssue(YM,pidIssue,1)) set idFromLocn = $$$INIssueFromLocn(objIssue) if $$$INIssueType(objIssue) = 3 { set idToLocn = $$$INIssueCustomerID(objIssue) if idToLocn'="" { set idToLocn = idToLocn_" ("_$$$INKUNDEName1($get(^INKUNDE(YM,idToLocn,1)))_")" } } else { set idToLocn = $$$INIssueToLocn(objIssue) if idToLocn'="" { set idToLocn = idToLocn_" ("_$$$WWW0121LocationName($get(^WWW0121(0,YM,idToLocn,1)))_")" } } set idRef = $$$INIssueCustomerName(objIssue) set intStatus = $$$INIssueStatus(objIssue) set dtePosted = $$$INIssuePosted(objIssue) ; TABLE 1 ;--------------------------------------- DO START1000^WWWTAB WRITE YCR,"" ; TABLE 2A ;--------------------------------------- WRITE YCR,YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE "" WRITE "
" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWFORMNAME("INIssueLoc")_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32503) ; "Picklist" WRITE "" WRITE "
",YCR WRITE "" ; "Issued By " "Location" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(33404)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(388)_": "_idFromLocn_" ("_$$$WWW0121LocationName($get(^WWW0121(0,YM,idFromLocn,1)))_")" WRITE "" WRITE "
",YCR ; TABLE 2A END ; TABLE 2B ;--------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "",YCR WRITE "",YCR WRITE "" WRITE "",YCR WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "
" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32807)_": " ; "For" : To location WRITE idToLocn WRITE "
" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32247)_": " ; "Reference" WRITE idRef WRITE "" WRITE "		" WRITE "" WRITE " " WRITE "
" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32781)_": "_intStatus ; "Status" WRITE "" WRITE "		" WRITE "" if pidIssue '= "" write $$^WWWFELDNAME("INIssueLoc","P",1)_": "_pidIssue WRITE "" WRITE "
" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" write $$^WWWFELDNAME("INIssueLoc","D",$$$FldINIssuePosted)_":"_$select(dtePosted'="":$zdt(dtePosted,3),1:"") WRITE "
",YCR ; TABLE 2B END DO STOP^WWWTAB ; TABLE 1 END quit Header(UES) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 20-Feb-2009 GRF SR16303: Move Title & into List to match
; 03-Feb-2009 DavidR SR16303: copied and modified from INTRNPick ; 15-Sep-2008 GRF replace "I" with "loop" ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new loop write "" do NL^WWWTAB for loop=1:1 { quit:$piece(UES,Y,loop,99)="" do NHWZ^WWWTAB write $piece(UES,Y,loop)," " do EH^WWWTAB } do EL^WWWTAB write "" quit
